column4: Everytime i modprobe ndiswrapper my kernel locks up, how can i debug this and find out what is going on
Everytime i modprobe ndiswrapper my kernel locks up, how can i debug this and find out what is going on or fix it?
are you sure you need ndiswrapper?
I believe so my wireless card is broadcom which work with ndiswrappers previously in hoary and is driver bcmwll5.
does ndiswrapper -l show the proper file before modprobe?
